thread.title: Venus Williams eases into quarterfinals of Hong Kong Open
thread.title_full: Venus Williams eases into quarterfinals of Hong Kong Open

author: wtopstaff
title: Venus Williams eases into quarterfinals of Hong Kong Open
text:
By The Associated Press October 15, 2015 9:24 am Venus Williams of the United States hits a return shot against Wang Yafan of China during the second round match at the WTA Hong Kong Open tennis tournament in Hong Kong, Thursday, Oct. 15, 2015. (AP Photo/Kin Cheung) 
HONG KONG (AP) — Venus Williams brushed aside Wang Yafan of China 6-0, 6-2 Thursday to reach the quarterfinals of the Hong Kong Open. 
Williams will next play eighth-seeded Alize Cornet of France, who outlasted Yaroslava Shvedova of Kazakhstan 6-7 (4), 6-3, 6-4. 
The 143rd-ranked Want struggled with her serve throughout the match against Williams, and failed to convert three break points in the seventh game of the second set. 
The 21-year-old Wang said “I have only seen Venus Williams on television before and to be playing such a famous player on court was a big honor for me, but I was very nervous.” 
Seventh-seeded Caroline Garcia of France also reached the quarterfinals by defeating Anastasiya Komardina of Russia 6-0, 6-2. Topics:
